name: Tesla, Inc.
key_products_or_services: Electric vehicles, Solar panels, Energy storage systems
summary: Tesla is an American electric vehicle and clean energy company founded in 2003 by Elon Musk. The company designs, manufactures, and sells electric vehicles, as well as solar panels and energy storage systems.
ai_automation_idea: Implement an AI-powered predictive maintenance system to detect and prevent potential issues with electric vehicle components, such as batteries and motors, to reduce downtime and improve overall fleet reliability.
